name: Bandolero - Serie A Aventureros - Sagaces
additionalNotes: The Bandolero is a premium cigar brand released by Selected Tobacco, which was founded by Nelson Alfonso.Â Bandolero Aventureros cigars are comprised of half undisclosed tobaccos along with half Peruvian filler. Holding these fillers together is a binder of secret origin. A complex Ecuadorian Habano wrapper is the icing on the cake! The result is complex notes of spice, cocoa, wood, and pepper. The cigars is extremely well made with an outstanding burn.
